title: Pre-Learning Assessment-Based Social Studies Curriculum for Optimizing Differentiated Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Conducted in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technical Environments, with Comprehensive Evaluation of Learners' Concept Application Abilities via Project-Based Assessment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose their conceptual understanding level through pre-assessment and design individualized learning pathways.
Learners can analyze core social studies concepts with over 85% accuracy and apply them to project deliverables.
Learners execute a feedback routine that improves learning outcomes by over 70% through peer and self-assessment.
